entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Debugging in VS Browser KeepAlive #45041
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Invoking endpoint filter but not handler on argument error causes VoidTaskResult to be written to the response body #45040
  • Results.File and Results.Stream consume large amount of Memory, don't stream file directly anymore #45037
  • SocketTransportFactory should implement IConnectionListenerFactorySelector publically #45035
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore') #45034
  • Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45033
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM stuck in infinite Http Request Loop #45032
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45031
  • dotnet-getdocument issues in .NET7 #45025
  • MicrosoftIdentityOption.ReturnUrlParameter does not appear to work #45024
  • Unable to configure HTTPS endpoint #45023
  • HostingStartup failed to execute after updating to .net 7/asp.core 7 on Azure App Service #45022
  • Enable http/3 from docker containers #45021
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_actix #45020
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #45019
  • Blazor User Blocked from Downloading DLL Files #45018
  • Shadow copy directory in inconsistent state after reboot #45017
  • OutputCaching not returning API version headers #45016
  • OutputCache Attribute does not support Tags #45015
  • CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014

Closed

  • Limit Buffering in ConnectionHandler while forwarding Data? #44975
  • Exception from Kestrel Webserver in Net7 #45029
  • .NET Core 7 Output Cache does not work with app.UseEndpoints() properly #44739
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor Server On Connection Authentication #44820
  • Cannot receive push data from API when build app release with proguard android #44993
  • Blazor JS Interop is bugged in an hard to reproduce scenario. #44927
    Backlog
  • Support Declarative Shadow DOM in Razor/Blazor files #44986
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Program.cs throws exception with Serilog log path #44958
  • Update to the latest Bootstrap version #43096
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Wasm: Antivirus rejects files written to cache, despite DLL bundling #40139
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Long delay for request to start while debugging and another request is waiting #44940

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Restore IISServerSetupFilter server type check #45036
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Workaround linker regression #45028
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45027
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Use restore.cmd to Restore the Project #45026
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Removing duplicated semi-colons #45038
    8.0-preview1
  • Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45013
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add template for analyzer/codefixer proposals #45009
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2043013 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime
